title: I don't quiet get how Jinx's "Pow-Pow" AS stacks work, how is it increased to a maximum of 70%?

replies.body: You probably shouldn't put your question in the title, you should probably have a title like "Question On Jinx's Pow-Pow" because you've spelt "quiet" and not "quite" and now have no way to fix that.
thanks for the tip, I'll keep it in mind.
